description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for an Amazon FSx for Lustre file system is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FSx for Lustre location to describe.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FSx for Lustre location that was described.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URI of the FSx for Lustre location that was described.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups that are configured for the FSx for Lustre file system.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the FSx for Lustre location was created.
